item.title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan’s latest film, Game Changer, continues to perform well at the box office, with promising early estimates for its second day.

  • Day 1 earnings were strong at 54 crores net across all languages in India.
  • The Hindi version opened particularly well, earning 8.64 crores.
  • On Day 2, it is estimated to earn between 7-7.50 crores.
  • This reflects a drop of 18-13% from its opening day but maintains a strong total.
  • Game Changer competes with Jr NTR’s Devara, which collected 17.45 crores over two days.
“Despite a regular working Friday, Shankar’s directorial made a stunning opening.”

The film is attracting decent reviews and positive word-of-mouth, promising continued interest.

item.title: Mandy Moore hits back at critics who slammed her for family's LA fire relief fundraiser: ‘Kindly F off’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mandy Moore Defends Family's Fire Relief Fundraiser Amid Criticism

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actress Mandy Moore has responded to criticism regarding her family's fire relief fundraiser on social media. Moore shared a GoFundMe link to help her brother-in-law and sister-in-law, Griff and Kit, after they lost their home to the Eaton Fire, highlighting the immediate need for support as they prepare for their first child.

  • Moore's family was affected by the Eaton Fire, which devastated their home.
  • She emphasized their urgent need for help with a baby on the way.
  • Moore faced backlash for promoting the fundraiser, to which she responded strongly.
  • She pointed out that the couple's situation is dire, as Griff, a musician, lost his tools of trade.
  • Moore urged her followers to contribute and show empathy rather than criticism.
“Kindly F OFF. no one is forcing you to do anything.”

In conclusion, Mandy Moore expresses the importance of community support and emotional resilience during such challenging times.

item.title: Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 3 - Sacnilk
item.description:
Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 3

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Sacnilk

Rekhachithram performed well at the box office, earning an estimated ₹4.10 Cr in its first two days. On the third day, the film earned around ₹3.25 Cr (early estimates).

Key Points

  • Day 1 collection: ₹1.9 Cr
  • Day 2 collection: ₹2.2 Cr (15.79% increase)
  • Day 3 collection: ₹3.25 Cr (early estimates)
  • Total collection after 3 days: ₹7.35 Cr
  • Overall Malayalam occupancy: 61.32%

Day 3 Malayalam (2D) Occupancy

  • Morning Shows: 38.84%
  • Afternoon Shows: 56.70%
  • Evening Shows: 69.52%
  • Night Shows: 80.21%
"Rekhachithram had an overall 61.32% Malayalam Occupancy on Saturday."

About This Movie: Directed by Jofin T. Chacko and produced by Kavya Film Company and Ann Mega Media, the film stars Asif Ali, Anaswara Rajan, Manoj K. Jayan, and Siddique.

Disclaimer: The Box Office Data are compiled from various sources and are approximate.

item.title: Shalini Passi lost sensation in spine and legs after giving birth at 20: ‘Doctor said, for the rest of your life…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shalini Passi lost sensation in spine and legs after giving birth at 20: ‘Doctor said, for the rest of your life…’

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Shalini Passi shares her journey of overcoming physical limitations after giving birth at a young age, defying medical advice to regain her mobility.

  • Shalini Passi lost sensation in her spine and legs after childbirth.
  • She was advised by her doctor to receive spine injections and refrain from dancing.
  • Determined to regain her abilities, she pursued alternate therapies including Yoga and muscle training.
  • Her doctor expressed surprise at her recovery, calling it a miracle.
“My doctor said, ‘You will have to get an injection in your spine for the rest of your life’…”

Shalini’s story highlights her determination and the importance of alternative therapies in recovery, fostering a close bond with her son throughout their journey.

item.title: Shark Tank India 4 pitcher with 400 acres of family land puts Anupam Mittal ‘in his place’, gets called ‘laadli’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shark Tank India 4 pitcher with 400 acres of family land puts Anupam Mittal ‘in his place’, gets called ‘laadli’

Publication Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Indian Express

The fourth season of Shark Tank India has begun with notable pitches, including a memorable one from cousins Preeti and Sayali for their jaggery brand, Gudworld. They sought Rs 50 lakh for a 2% equity stake in their company.

  • Preeti’s effective communication impressed all the sharks.
  • Vineeta Singh and Aman Gupta had differing opinions on the business strategy.
  • Aman ultimately offered Rs 50 lakh for a 6% equity stake.
  • Preeti negotiated and accepted a counteroffer of 5% equity.
  • Anupam Mittal referred to Preeti as 'laadli' after their discussion.
“You are the king of e-commerce, and we would really value your mentorship.” – Preeti

The pitch showcased the potential and resources available to the entrepreneurs, leading to a successful investment deal.

item.title: Sameer Wankhede reacts to Aryan Khan’s alleged intoxicated video from New Year’s party, says he can’t be threatened by troll armies: ‘I’ve faced terrorists’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Sameer Wankhede reacts to Aryan Khan’s alleged intoxicated video from New Year’s party, says he can’t be threatened by troll armies: ‘I’ve faced terrorists’

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interview, Sameer Wankhede discusses the backlash he faced after Aryan Khan's arrest, his views on trolling, and comments on the alleged intoxication video of Aryan Khan from a New Year’s party.

  • Sameer Wankhede was involved in Aryan Khan's arrest in 2021 for an alleged drug case.
  • Wankhede insists that online trolling does not affect him, stating, “Trolling is entertainment for me.”
  • He addressed the video of Aryan Khan reportedly being drunk, suggesting that the New Year’s celebration culture promotes excessive drinking.
  • Wankhede highlighted the importance of enforcing law equally for all.
  • He dismissed speculation regarding Shah Rukh Khan’s attitude post-arrest and remarked he hasn’t been following SRK’s actions.
“I have faced much worse: bullets, terrorists. These are very small things.”

Wankhede believes in the integrity of the law and notes that the absence of drugs at the time of arrest does not exempt individuals from charges related to drug distribution.

item.title: Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan-starrer’s Rs 186 crore debut disputed, analysts allege Rs 100 crore inflation - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

S Shankar’s highly anticipated film, Game Changer, starring Ram Charan, has seen a strong opening at the box office, though its reported collection figures are disputed.

  • The film collected Rs 51.25 crore in India on its opening day.
  • It surpassed Ram Charan’s previous solo release, Vinaya Vidheya Rama, which made Rs 34 crore.
  • Allegations have arisen of Rs 100 crore inflation in reported collections.
  • The film achieved an impressive occupancy rate, particularly in its morning and 4DX afternoon shows.
The king’s arrival is setting the box office ablaze! #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE 💥💥 GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1 ❤‍🔥

The director, S Shankar, hopes this film will perform better than his previous release, Indian 2, which only grossed Rs 25.6 crore on its opening day.

item.title: After HC rap, Telangana govt withdraws orders on ‘Game Changer’ ticket price hike - Telangana Today
item.description:
After HC Rap, Telangana Govt Withdraws Orders on 'Game Changer' Ticket Price Hike

Published Date: 11 January 2025, 10:04 PM | Source: Telangana Today

The Telangana government has decided to withdraw its orders for a hike in ticket prices and additional morning shows for the movie 'Game Changer' due to public safety concerns following an incident at another film screening.

  • The government will not allow early morning shows until public interest and safety are evaluated.
  • This decision came after the High Court directed the state government to reconsider its previous decision to increase ticket prices and allow extra shows.
  • Initially, permission was granted for an additional show and a ticket price hike of Rs 100 for multiplexes and Rs 50 for standalone theatres.
  • Previous incidents related to ticket pricing and early screenings have raised public concern.
  • The Chief Minister reiterated that the government would not allow further price hikes or benefit shows.
“The orders were issued following the High Court’s directions to reconsider the hike in ticket prices.”

This withdrawal reflects the government's commitment to public safety and interests in light of recent incidents.

item.title: These scenes in Prabhas Fauji to stand out - 123telugu
item.description:
These scenes in Prabhas Fauji to stand out

Published on Jan 11, 2025 | Source: 123 Telugu

Prabhas is currently working on multiple films, including Fauji, directed by Hanu Raghavapudi, which is on hold due to his injury. Notable scenes depicting the 1940s freedom fight are reported to have turned out exceptionally well.

  • Prabhas' Fauji is being directed by Hanu Raghavapudi.
  • The film is currently on hold due to Prabhas' injury.
  • Scenes related to the 1940s freedom fight have been executed well.
  • Patriotic elements are expected to leave audiences shocked.
  • The film combines drama and romance uniquely.
“The drama in Fauji, combined with romance, is expected to be exceptional.”

Fans should stay tuned for more updates about this highly anticipated film.

item.title: Park Sung Hoon To No Longer Star In Upcoming Drama By "My Love From The Star" Director - soompi
item.description:
Park Sung Hoon Leaves Upcoming Drama Directed by 'My Love From The Star' Director

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: SOOMPI

Park Sung Hoon has exited his role in the upcoming drama “The Tyrant’s Chef” following controversy.

  • He was initially offered the male lead role alongside YoonA.
  • Controversy arose when he posted a controversial image on social media.
  • His agency clarified the incident but backlash led to calls for him to step down.
  • Studio Dragon announced the mutual decision for him not to join the project.
  • No new casting plans or schedule have been set yet.
“The actor and his agency expressed their apologies several times regarding the recent events.”

The departure of Park Sung Hoon raises questions about the future of the drama and its cast.

item.title: Game Changer Hindi Box Box Office: Biggest Year-Opener Post-COVID With 423% Higher Earnings – Ram Charan Breaks 3 Major Records! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Achieves Record Year-Opener Post-COVID

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan, has opened with remarkable success, earning ₹8.64 crore on its first day, marking the biggest year-opener at the box office since the COVID pandemic.

  • Game Changer outperformed the previous record held by Badhaai Do, which opened at ₹1.65 crore in 2022.
  • The film's earnings are reported to be 423% higher than Badhaai Do.
  • Game Changer is now the second biggest Sankranti opener in the last 10 years.
  • It has broken three major records in its opening day performance.
  • Game Changer's opening day earnings were 146% higher than Ram Charan’s last Hindi film, Zanjeer, which earned ₹3.5 crore in 2013.
“Ram Charan has delivered the biggest year-opener at the box office post-COVID.”

This impressive box office performance indicates a strong recovery for the film industry and a significant resumption of audience interest in cinema following the pandemic.

item.title: Manisha Koirala drops a hint about companion in her life: ‘Who said I don’t have one’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Manisha Koirala hints at having a companion in her life

Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Manisha Koirala has recently made waves with her commentary on personal relationships. In a recent interview, she expressed that she doesn't wish to compromise her quality of life for a companion.

  • In a subtle hint, she questioned the assumption that she is single.
  • Manisha emphasized her focus on maintaining a fulfilling life, suggesting that a relationship should complement, not change, her current situation.
  • She reflected on her past marriage and her journey since overcoming cancer, highlighting a shift towards balance and freedom in her life.
“Who said I don’t have one? … I don’t want to compromise and let go of the quality of life that I have.”

This candid discussion sheds light on Koirala's current mindset, suggesting that while she remains open to companionship, her well-being and independence come first.

item.title: Sukumar turns 55, begins scripting for his next - 123telugu
item.description:
Sukumar Turns 55 and Begins Scripting for His Next Film

Published on Jan 11, 2025 9:05 pm IST

Sukumar, a prominent figure in the Telugu film industry, is celebrating his 55th birthday and has started working on the script for his next project featuring Ram Charan.

  • Sukumar is known for his successful film, Pushpa, whose sequel has gained global attention.
  • He is currently on a break in the US after working on Pushpa 2 for two years.
  • The upcoming project is expected to showcase Ram Charan in a new role and is described as a rustic drama.
  • Fans and industry peers are celebrating Sukumar's birthday and wishing him success in future endeavors.
"He has undoubtedly made the Telugu film industry proud."

This birthday marks a significant moment for Sukumar as he embarks on new creative endeavors in 2025.

item.title: Raveena Tandon reacts to Rasha Thadani hilariously imitating her ‘fuzzy and cute’ voice - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Raveena Tandon reacts to Rasha Thadani hilariously imitating her ‘fuzzy and cute’ voice

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Rasha Thadani imitated her mom Raveena Tandon's voice from earlier films, providing a humorous moment that delighted both Raveena and fans.

  • Rasha will debut in the film Azaad, co-starring Ajay Devgn’s nephew.
  • During promotions, Rasha humorously imitated Raveena’s voice, making her mother laugh.
  • The impression reference included a famous dialogue from Raveena’s 1994 film Andaz Apna Apna.
  • Raveena started her career in 1991 and received a Filmfare Award for her debut.
  • Fans reacted positively, with many expressing their amusement on social media.
“Hahahhahahah.” - Raveena Tandon reacting to Rasha's impression

Rasha’s debut film Azaad is set to release in theaters on January 17.

item.title: Ram Charan shares details about Prabhas' soon-to-be bride amidst marriage rumours: 'She might be from Gan - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ram Charan shares details about Prabhas' soon-to-be bride amidst marriage rumours

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The internet is abuzz with speculation surrounding Prabhas' marriage as Ram Charan reveals hints about his bride during a recent chat show appearance.

  • Ram Charan appeared on 'Unstoppable with NBK' and hinted that Prabhas' bride might be from Ganapavaram.
  • Social media is filled with speculation as fans react to the news.
  • Rumours about Prabhas' marriage have circulated for years, particularly involving actress Anushka Shetty.
  • Prabhas has previously downplayed marriage rumours, stating he doesn't want to break the hearts of his female fans.
“I do not want to break the hearts of my female fans by getting married too soon.” - Prabhas

This revelation by Ram Charan has reignited discussions about Prabhas' personal life and whether he will soon settle down.

item.title: From Sookshmadarshini to Miss You to I Am Kathalan: New Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu OTT releases to watch on - The Economic Times
item.description:
From Sookshmadarshini to Miss You to I Am Kathalan: New Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu OTT releases to watch

Date: This week

Source: Panache Magazine

This week brings an exciting array of South Indian films premiering on OTT platforms, offering the perfect opportunity to enjoy fresh releases from the comfort of your home.

  • Sookshmadarshini: A gripping thriller about a small-town homemaker entangled in a web of suspicion after her neighbor's mother disappears. Streaming on Disney Plus Hotstar.
  • Miss You: A romantic drama featuring Siddharth and Ashika Ranganath available on Amazon Prime Video.
  • I Am Kathalan: A story of a college student overcoming challenges, set to premiere on ManoramaMAX on January 17, 2024.
  • Bachchala Malli: A Telugu film streaming on ETV Win featuring Allari Naresh.
  • Pani: Premiering on SonyLIV on January 16, 2025, this series follows real estate ambitions and challenges.
  • Break Out: A Telugu film about a filmmaker confronting his fears, available on ETV Win.
  • Neeli Megha Shyama: A romantic drama exploring life-altering experiences, streaming on Aha.
  • Hide N Seek: A gripping Telugu thriller revolving around mysterious suicides now available on Aha.

These films promise a mix of suspense, drama, and entertainment for movie enthusiasts.

Notable Quotes:

“These films offer a mix of suspense, drama, and entertainment, making them a must-watch.”

The new OTT releases cater to diverse tastes and are a testament to the rich storytelling tradition of South Indian cinema.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film sees dip in collections - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Shankar's Ram Charan film sees dip in collections

Date: Jan 11, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Shankar’s new film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, collected ₹17.92 crore on its second day, bringing its total to ₹68.92 crore amid stiff competition during the festival season.

  • The film was released on January 10 and has received mixed reviews.
  • It is competing with other notable Sankranthi releases.
  • Despite high expectations, the occupancy rates were only decent compared to previous works by Shankar.
“Game Changer had high expectations but now faces stiff competition from newly released films.”

This film showcases Ram Charan in dual roles as an IAS officer and an activist, portraying significant political themes in its narrative.

item.title: Gauri Khan to Karan Johar: Who wore what to the glamorous 'Gilded Hour' event in Mumbai - The Times of India
item.description:
Gauri Khan to Karan Johar: Who wore what to the glamorous 'Gilded Hour' event in Mumbai

Publication Date: Jan 11, 2025   |   Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated 'Gilded Hour' event in Mumbai showcased stunning outfits from various celebrities, highlighting the glamour and elegance of the occasion.

  • Karan Johar opted for a stylish all-white ensemble featuring a satin shirt and blazer.
  • Sidharth Malhotra stole the spotlight as the showstopper in a navy blue satin blazer.
  • Gauri Khan dazzled in a shimmering golden dress paired with a beige textured jacket.
  • Malaika Arora made a chic statement in a maroon leather bodycon dress.
  • Sonali Bendre looked iconic in a black full-sleeved top and elegant pants.
  • Sussanne Khan impressed in a flowy black midi dress with sequined details.
  • Farah Khan Kunder showcased a bold all-red look with a diamond-studded necklace.
“The Gilded Hour turned into a dazzling star-studded affair.” - Piyali Bhadra

The event was a celebration of grace, glam, and elegance, bringing together notable personalities from the film industry.

item.title: Manisha Koirala opens up about whether she misses having a companion in life: 'Who said I don’t have one? - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Manisha Koirala opens up about whether she misses having a companion in life: 'Who said I don’t have one?'

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

In a recent interview, Manisha Koirala shared her thoughts on companionship, life fulfillment, and her experiences post-cancer.

  • Koirala humorously negated the idea that she misses having a companion, asserting, 'Who said I don’t have one?'
  • She emphasized her desire not to settle for less than she deserves in a relationship.
  • Koirala believes that if a true companion is meant to be, it will naturally happen.
  • She values her current freedom, fulfillment, and the choices in her life.
  • Manisha continues to captivate audiences with her performances, recently starring in Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar.
“If a companion could enhance my life, I would be happy, but I don’t wish to change my present situation.”

Manisha Koirala is content with her life’s quality, remaining open to companionship without compromising what she cherishes.

item.title: Tiku Talsania suffers a brain stroke, critical in hospital, Malaika Arora-Arjun Kapoor spark reunion rumo - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Tiku Talsania suffers a brain stroke; critical in hospital, Malaika Arora-Arjun Kapoor spark reunion rumors: Top 5 news

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Veteran actor Tiku Talsania has suffered a brain stroke and is currently in critical condition at a Mumbai hospital. Meanwhile, rumors of a reunion between Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor spark interest among fans.

  • Tiku Talsania suffered a brain stroke during a film screening and is hospitalized.
  • Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora's sighting together at a fashion event raises reunion speculations.
  • Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma make a public appearance with their children.
  • Cryptic posts surrounding Prabhas's marriage generate excitement.
  • Manisha Koirala advocates for gender equality in Bollywood.
“The guru acknowledged their national influence, equating their contributions to a form of service.”

This article highlights significant occurrences in the entertainment industry, showcasing both health concerns and relationship developments.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat surprises Savi as her IAS preparations begin with the Thakkars' support - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat surprises Savi as her IAS preparations begin with the Thakkars' support

Published: Saturday, January 11, 2025 at 12:42 PM

The upcoming episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin showcases Rajat aiding Savi in shifting her focus towards her IAS exam preparations amidst family turmoil.

  • Rajat surprises Savi with a hall ticket for her UPSC exam, which he submitted on her behalf.
  • Savi is encouraged by Sai to pursue her dream of becoming an IAS officer.
  • Rajat and Sai provide emotional and practical support to Savi as she studies for her exam.
  • Ashika's jealousy towards Savi's success and familial support adds tension to the storyline.
“You can finally give the UPSC exam,” Rajat tells Savi, sharing the good news of her application submission.

This episode highlights themes of support, ambition, and family dynamics as Savi prepares for a significant step in her career.

item.title: From Taarak Mehta fame Gurucharan Singh getting hospitalised to Manas Shah reacting to being labeled as Chahat Pandey’s mystery man: Top TV news - The Times of India
item.description:
Top TV News: Gurucharan Singh Hospitalized and Manas Shah Responds to Relationship Rumors

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: Times of India

The television industry has recently witnessed notable events including Gurucharan Singh's hospitalization and actor Manas Shah's response to rumors about his relationship with Chahat Pandey.

  • Gurucharan Singh, known for his role in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, was hospitalized due to declining health.
  • Manas Shah addressed rumors connecting him romantically to Chahat Pandey from Bigg Boss 18.
  • Vivian Dsena's controversial gameplay in Bigg Boss 18 led to discussions of bias and criticism.
  • Dhanashree Verma spoke out against divorce rumors with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal.
  • Statements made by other TV personalities, including Ekta Kapoor's response to alleged misinformation.
“Haalat bahot zyada kharab ho gayi hai.” - Gurucharan Singh

This article highlights crucial updates from the television industry, showcasing ongoing personal and professional challenges faced by notable figures.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunnam: Mastermind Anil Ravipudi deserves applause - 123telugu
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunnam: Mastermind Anil Ravipudi deserves applause

Published on: Jan 11, 2025 6:00 pm IST

Sankranthiki Vasthunnam is set to hit theaters on January 14, 2025, starring Venkatesh, Aishwarya Rajesh, Naresh, and Meenakshi Chaudhary.

  • Anil Ravipudi directs the film and has received acclaim for his innovative promotional strategies.
  • The promotional campaigns have created significant buzz, with the teaser and songs trending online.
  • Venkatesh’s involvement in the promotion has further stirred interest among fans.

item.title: Game Changer box office report: Ram Charan-Shankar film mints over ₹71 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 2

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The film 'Game Changer', featuring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar, has performed well at the box office, earning over ₹71 crore within two days of its release.

  • The film collected ₹20.05 crore on its second day, bringing its total collection to ₹71.05 crore.
  • It has surpassed the initial performance of Shankar's previous film 'Indian 2'.
  • Mixed reviews were given but Ram Charan's performance was praised.
  • The film faces competition from upcoming releases.
“Despite being a weekend, the Telugu version had only 20.66% occupancy for the morning shows.”

Overall, 'Game Changer' shows promise but will need to maintain performance amid stiff competition.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Ram Charan-Shankar film to beat Indian 2 lifetime? - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 2 (updated live): Shankar's Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer seems to fare better than his Kamal Haasan-starrer.

Publication Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has performed better than expected, earning ₹15.47 crore on its second day.

  • Released on January 10, Game Changer collected a total of ₹66.47 crore by the end of its second day.
  • It had a lower occupancy rate compared to other language versions, with a peak of 36.09% in the evening.
  • Game Changer is projected to compete with other upcoming Sankranthi releases for audience attention.
Shankar’s previous film, Indian 2, collected ₹25.6 crore on its opening day.

In conclusion, while Game Changer has made a strong debut, it faces significant competition from other films released during the festive season.

item.title: Major outrage over Harry-Meghan's visit to LA fire victims: 'You are not royals...merely two nitwit celeb - The Times of India
item.description:
Major outrage over Harry-Meghan's visit to LA fire victims: 'You are not royals...merely two nitwit celebrities'

Publication Date: (Date not provided) Source: (Source not provided)

Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's recent visit to fire victims in Los Angeles has sparked significant backlash, with critics labeling them as 'merely two nitwit celebrities' rather than royals.

  • The visit intended to support families affected by recent fires.
  • Public reaction included criticism of their celebrity status overshadowing genuine royal duties.
  • Social media platforms fueled discussions around their motivations for the visit.
'You are not royals...merely two nitwit celebrities'

The outrage highlights ongoing tensions regarding the public's perception of Harry and Meghan's roles post-royalty.

item.title: Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case, Court Lists Down Relaxations For Pushpa 2 Actor - News18
item.description:
Allu Arjun Gets BIG Relief In Fan's Death Case

Date: January 11, 2025 Source: News18

Allu Arjun received significant legal relaxations in connection with the Pushpa 2 stampede case, alleviating some conditions previously imposed on him after his arrest last month.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in relation to a stampede incident that occurred at the Pushpa 2 premiere, which resulted in a woman's death and injuries to a child.
  • The Nampally court has exempted him from appearing at the Chikkadapally police station every Sunday for security reasons.
  • He has also been granted permission to travel abroad.

"The crowd went out of control after Allu Arjun stepped out of his car to greet fans attending the premiere," stated a source close to the incident.

This legal development comes after Allu Arjun was previously remanded to judicial custody and then granted interim bail.

item.title: Marco Hindi Box Office Collection Day 22: Unni Mukundan Earns 22 Times More Than Aadujeevitham, 1278% Higher Than ARM! - Koimoi
item.description:
Marco Hindi Box Office Collection Day 22: Unni Mukundan Earns 22 Times More Than Aadujeevitham

Publication Date: January 10, 2023 | Source: Koimoi

Marco’s Hindi version continues to perform strongly at the box office. After 22 days, the film has grossed a total of 11.03 crore, establishing itself as a surprise winner. Unni Mukundan's film in India is nearing 60 crore, with its worldwide total approaching 100 crore.

  • Highest-Grossing Hindi Dubbed Malayalam Film
  • Earned 0.23 crore on Day 22, a drop of 61.6% from previous earnings.
  • 22 times higher box office earnings compared to Aadujeevitham.
  • 1278% higher than Ajayante Randam Moshanam.
“Marco earned 22 times more than Aadujeevitham and 1278% more than Ajayante Randam Moshanam.”

In conclusion, Marco is not only making significant earnings but also impacting the market dynamics significantly within the Hindi dubbed film segment.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 promo: Salman Khan asks Karan Veer Mehra to come out of house; says, ‘I can fulfill your wis - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 promo: Salman Khan asks Karan Veer Mehra to come out of house; says, ‘I can fulfill your wish

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The latest episodes of Bigg Boss 18 showcase tensions between host Salman Khan and contestant Karan Veer Mehra, igniting discussions about strategic gameplay versus personal relationships.

  • Karan Veer Mehra competes for his friend Chum Darang in the Ticket to Finale task.
  • Salman Khan criticizes Karan's choice to prioritize friendship over personal gameplay.
  • Karan defends his stance, emphasizing selflessness, but faces pushback on his strategy.
“If you are so magnanimous, perhaps the show is too small for you.” – Salman Khan

This situation reveals the ongoing challenge of maintaining relationships while competing in a reality show where strategy and individual performance are crucial.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Ashika to come between Rajat and Savi after Arsh's betrayal - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Ashika to come between Rajat and Savi after Arsh's betrayal

Published: Saturday, January 11, 2025 at 10:25 AM

In the upcoming episode, Ashika's return marks a turning point as she disrupts Rajat and Savi's relationship following Arsh's shocking actions. The tension rises within the Thakkar household as Ashika tries to manipulate situations to connect with Rajat.

  • Ashika arrives at the Thakkar household, looking to establish her presence.
  • Arsh assaults Mrunmayee, leading to a profound shift in Ashika's beliefs about him.
  • Rajat decides to bring Ashika and her son Kiaan into the home, causing family discord.
  • Savi expresses strong opposition to Ashika's presence following the turmoil.
  • Rajat prioritizes Kiaan's well-being, despite the family's hesitations.
  • Ashika attempts to gain Rajat's sympathy, promising to testify against Arsh.
  • Events culminate in a confrontation where Rajat limits Ashika's place in his life.
Rajat emphasizes to Ashika: "You only have a place in my life because of Kiaan."

The episode illustrates the complexities of relationships and the consequences of betrayal, leading to unexpected alliances and conflicts.
